name: Best Of Ludum Dare (2013 - 2019)
description:
This is a collection of the games I've made for Ludum Dare that I'm the most proud of!

The games include:

  • Moving Day | Move your house to a new place for lower rent while minimizing home damage!
  • Antiphase | You are being made OBSOLETE! Defy your creator and keep control of the level
  • While True Do | Drift through life and collect 'Life Points' until...
  • The Sun Returns | Kill your solar neighbours and steal their mass to fight the sun 1v1
  • Theovexus | Stop cowboys from stealing your collectible legends and myths (by shooting them)
  • Voice Box | Control a physics box with your microphone volume to complete levels
  • Platformer Roulette | Complete levels in under ten seconds, or risk being shot in the face by a revolver!

Some games have been modified or re-exported to be available on all platforms and run optimally.

Source code is provided when available. Unfortunately, the Source Code for Moving Day could not be found.
